website_summaries.verdict: MMA and Muay Thai rated kick boxing gloves that mix foam and breathable mesh provide comfort as well as protection.
pros: Easy to get on and off
Good absorption for bag work and punching
Comfortable and durable kick boxing gloves
Offer a secure and tight fit
cons: Mesh material can sometimes be uncomfortable during heavy punching

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Supportive Fit
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have a comfortable full wrist wrap strap, providing superior wrist support and more customized fit. The full mesh palm is breathable material and the new design with extended knuckle padding protects fingers while training, with synthetic leather construction for durability. The only drawback is the stitching on the inside of the glove may tear into your index knuckles after extended heavy bag workouts, although this may very well have more to do with punch technique than with use of the product. I am a satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Approved

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hit my 150 lb. Heavy Bag. I like these better than any other glove since it has a thick pencil sized piece of material inside the palm to help stop your fists from closing in when hitting the bag. Other MMA gloves I have used do not have this. I hit about 5 -10 minutes a morning and these wear out about every 6-8 months. For the price, I LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Kortoga

customer_reviews.title: Kicking butt
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glove, this was my second pair I got for CKO and this is more durable than the pink and white pair. Would purchase again when I need new gloves but have been using these for months!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Small. If you have little bitty hands, these are quality.
customer_reviews.text: These things are WAY too small. If you are a grown adult male, these shouldn't fit you. I should have known better than to buy a "one size fits all" being 6' 3" and 195 lbs. Quality seemed phenomenal and if I was a runt, these would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves to Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves. Nicely padded, good for grappling, can't complain. It does what it claims as long as you strike with the right form, you shouldn't feel pain on your wrist. Just go slowly at first for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

customer_reviews.title: Can't say anything great nor terrible about them
customer_reviews.text: i've had similar gloves by Everlast in the past. These are just ok. They've lowered their quality. Older versions were leather that will shape to your hand over time. These are some sort of plastic. Just average. Can't say anything great nor terrible about them. They get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Really not meant for a heavy bag.
customer_reviews.text: These are far to lightweight for any serious heavy bag work. Also, they are small for the advertised size. I could barely get these off after a workout. Perhaps these are fine for real MMA fighting but be careful with the heavy bag work.
customer_reviews.author: sandro OCASIO

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These gloves feel amazing! When you use these gloves compared to other types or even other brands, you can tell that these gloves are lightweight, and the mobility is A1. You must break them in before they feel very comfortable, so just clinch your hands to fists and repeat that movement over and over till it feels good on you.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson T.

customer_reviews.title: Neverlast
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit fine but they started peeling and leaving fake black leather skins all over the gym. This was after only a few weeks jabbing my wavemaster xxl.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but too Large
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, but way too big. I'm an average female, 5'4'', but these made my hands feel sort of clumsy wearing them. I'm going to keep them for the price, but in the future will look for something more my size.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Molnar

customer_reviews.title: Great product at less cost
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves I have had them for 8 months for kickboxing excercise. Great cost.
customer_reviews.author: Danny G NY

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are a bit smaller then I expected, I usually wear wraps with my regular gloves but these I can't get them on over the wrist wraps. I did buy them for backup set so they work for my work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Dale F Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Use these for kick boxing and they're very light weight and durable. No metal in the middle at the bottom of your fingers, just very tough rolled material. Perfect gloves to work out in! Nice tight fit, easy to velcro together. If there's one knock on them, they could breathe a little better. Pretty sweaty hands after an 30-60 minute workout. I recommend them for training or light duty sparring.
customer_reviews.author: Smile,Happiness & Love

customer_reviews.title: way too big
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't pick a size, since it's a one size fits all kinda product. But I was optimistic since my hands are fairly large. However, in my first workout the gloves were slipping and sliding all over my hands, which caused my skin to be scrubbed off and I started bleeding. I know Everlast has a huge product line for MMA workouts, but these gloves just don't do justice. Maybe other items are better, but those seem pretty cheesy and way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Babybubba85

customer_reviews.title: Throat Punch
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight but durable gloves. They do not slip up on the knuckles. I've been using them 3 times per week for 2 months and they have held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: freebirdgirl

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: A little too stiff for my preference. I ended up with a few scabs over the knuckles the first time I used them, but they do the job. I'll keep searching for something ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Ish

customer_reviews.title: Nive gloves
customer_reviews.text: At the begging they are kind of hard, but as you use them more, they start fitting better your hands. If I use they a lot they can kind of scratch my knuckles, but it's not too bad. They are also a little big for my hands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them so much I want another pair.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves kick butt! The range and comfort I get from using these are great and though I do love the breathable mesh design if you get into beast mode and go hard you can get a bit of friction in between the fingers. Get them but wear hand wraps under them.
customer_reviews.author: Keala Roy

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for even teenage boys hands
customer_reviews.text: I saw this an an Amazon best pick and then read the reviews before purchasing. I'm using the gloves for teenage boys and the gloves are too small for even some of them. Tight for me and I am a woman who wears a medium size glove. Would return for a refund but do not have my original packing.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Gresham

customer_reviews.title: These gloves do take a little bit of wear-in before they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: We use these gloves for high-intensity kickboxing. Much less weight on your hand than boxing gloves and they help you to keep your stamina and preserve your knuckles. These gloves do take a little bit of wear-in before they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Wow is this what gloves are like now days
customer_reviews.text: Wow is this what gloves are like now days? I thought since it had such good reviews they'd be decent, then I got this scratchy mesh crap and crappy pleather I know won't last a month up against my wooden dummy. Get some full leather gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell cray

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality. Can not be used on a bag
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality. Can not be used on a bag, will cut your hands up. I use them to shadow box, an expensive mistake - lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Tight. And I dont have big hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to spar with and use on a heavy bag. They fit my hand snug. Too snug to wrap my hands. But they will work for sparing
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.text: They are very stiff, but I think they will loosen up with use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: they work well to protect the hands during my kickboxing and is sturdy but the inside grip did begin to peel after like a week, never fell off or got worse then a corner but still something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: NekoLLX

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a present for my father in law and he absolutely loves them! Uses them every day and can’t stop raving about them. Excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Shyenne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Way too small Everlast should give choices between small and large because these are certainly not one size fits all. I should've just bought the same ones I use at Titleboxing's mma class from them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good feel with padding allowing for feedback on correct punching technique, the wrists straps provide good support and the mesh allows the gloves to breath and dry properly during and after intense workouts. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chad G

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are comfortable and fits my hands well. The quality is pretty solid. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: but the wrist strap needs to be longer to get better wrist support
customer_reviews.text: Have been using gloves in Krav Maga level 1 classes against a blocking bag and after 1 1/2 months of 2 classes a week the palm bar has come unsewn on one of the gloves. They protect my knuckles, but the wrist strap needs to be longer to get better wrist support. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Terrytown

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the fit is a off and it is very boxy and bulky
customer_reviews.author: amberstar

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a newbie but they seem great. Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A Gravel

customer_reviews.title: Size not match to be free size. It's very small
customer_reviews.text: It's very small and cannot fit inside my son's hands 15 years old however it was mentioned that it's free size. Not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ayman Elsherbeny

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly Large/X Large
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were very small for the advertised large size. I've bought the exact same glove size last year and they fit perfectly so there must be some variability in the manufacturing
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Mc Clelland

customer_reviews.title: and work great. This is my second pair because my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and work great. This is my second pair because my husband took over my others.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M McKinzie-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not true to description.
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived, they were not true to their description. I had to return them. They do not cover your knuckles as promised, and therefore, would not work well for kickboxing.
customer_reviews.author: Meg1982

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these. He's a large man, 6'6", 280lbs and they fit his hands
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Perfect size for my hands. Way more comfortable then full boxing gloves that cover your whole hand
customer_reviews.author: Sheya

customer_reviews.title: They would probably not hold up well for a serious kick-boxing enthusiast but they are working fine for me
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are performing as I would have expected based on price. They would probably not hold up well for a serious kick-boxing enthusiast but they are working fine for me. The thumb padding is a bit weak.
customer_reviews.author: ljimmyd

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I don't have huge hands. Gloves are way to small for someone with regular size hands. Would only recommend to someone who has very small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Won’t regret this buy
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly takes maybe a day or 2 to break them in but couldn’t be more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Garrett H.

customer_reviews.title: Need to use Wrist/hand wraps with MMA kick boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: Not good for heavy bags. 1st time using it bruised both hand knuckles. And second using it sprained wrist. You will still need to use hand/wrist wraps with the gloves for hitting the heavy bags.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lal

customer_reviews.title: It seems to have been made a little smaller but other than that the construction is good.
customer_reviews.text: The right hand glove is hard to get on. It seems to have been made a little smaller but other than that the construction is good.
customer_reviews.author: He is King

customer_reviews.title: The kick boxing gloves were given to my daughter-in-law as ...
customer_reviews.text: The kick boxing gloves were given to my daughter-in-law as a Christmas present. She loves them and has been using them at her kick boxing classes.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for boxing and MMA workouts. They also fit 108' wraps nicely for extra padding.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Owen

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my day-to-day bag gloves. I added 108" wraps to reduce chaffing, but these gloves allow my hands to breath, which is what is was looking for. The only potential drawback I see is that the wrist wrap is a single wrap, so it may not provide enough support if you have weak wrists. I would recommend theses gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: One size, runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking gloves, but size does NOT fit all - my husband could barely get them on past his knuckles. From other reviews it looks like there used to be at least a choice of small or large, but there isn't now. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: N. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. They are not comfortable. Go to the store instead
customer_reviews.author: karla vitela

customer_reviews.title: These are good for protecting my hands when I'm using the punching ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good for protecting my hands when I'm using the punching bag. Fit a little small, so hands get tired sooner than they should.
customer_reviews.author: P.R.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable & stiff
customer_reviews.text: I thought these gloves would eventually break in, but they havent. Even after weeks of use they are still bruising my knuckles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I brought a pair for me and for my girl for our kickboxing class and these gloves are amazing. Nothing negative to say here. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great product. A little thinner then I thought but works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tzvi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, invest in a better material.
customer_reviews.text: Ripped after 3 uses. Called customer service and get a replacement. Only reason I gave it more then 1 star...
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, and they're vegan! Very durable as well, I got two pairs for training in Muay Thai.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Not a Great experience
customer_reviews.text: They shipped relatively quickly, but when i got them there was tear down the seam on the right glove. They were slightly large, i continued to use them thinking the tear would not effect their ability. But it quickly broke down more and now it is practically held together with tape. The materials are good quality and if i got a smaller size it would have fit fine. Just a complaint on the quality they were in when i received them.
customer_reviews.author: shandon

customer_reviews.title: Must fit
customer_reviews.text: Gloves run a little small, but work well. Little difficult to take off, especially with sweaty hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Keller

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: After taking some kickboxing classes through groupon( gloves included) and I decided to proceed I definitely knew I needed finger less gloves. Take 1 class and you'll know exactly what I mean. Keep in mind I take these classes for exercise not serious boxing- I'm not climbing in the ring anytime soon :).I like these a lot, they are easy to get on and off, the fit well and so far are holding up well. I just wish the inside was a bit more comfortable I sometimes feel the mesh rubbing against on the inside on my hands .All and all great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: karen bariso

customer_reviews.title: nice product wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to fit me but my hands are too small!! my husband end up using them!!! nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Jan3R

customer_reviews.text: can never go wrong with everlast they great quality and great comfort I love my gloves they perfect for me a girl
customer_reviews.author: Christy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for body combat!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and they fit great the price is a little steep but I use mine a lot and I think it's worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cabby

customer_reviews.title: Not Liking these :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kickboxing class to replace the full size traditional boxing gloves I had been using- I ended up returning them- they are that bad. The outside material is plastic like and they have very little padding. I was shocked that Everlast would make something of this low quality. For a woman, my hands are quite large, but these gloves are huge. I would not recommend them as I found they offered very little protection and are of poor quality "toy-like" material.
customer_reviews.author: LilRascal82

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Fits my almost 5 feet 9 y/o well
customer_reviews.author: Ninjini2020

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect christmas gift for my brother, great material and look, I am very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Anuar Terrones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Its only one size and and too much bigger than my hand
customer_reviews.author: Rashed

customer_reviews.title: These are nice gloves for intermediate practitioners of MMA
customer_reviews.text: These are nice gloves for intermediate practitioners of MMA. They can be used on a heavy bag, or pads. Doesn't really matter. They have held up very nicely for 3 weeks of ownership so far. And i use them 3 hours+ a day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeCandia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves and pretty flexible. Definitely something good to have for sparring a day focus pad training.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Willis III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and looks exactly it's in the picture. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Shashi Anand

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, hold up in training, prime is a huge plus. Also very fitting and durable padding for intense training.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Lyon

customer_reviews.title: I like that my palms can stay cool do to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that my palms can stay cool do to the material but they r really stiff and the cushion didn't protect my knuckles to good cause I ended up with looked like carpet burn
customer_reviews.author: Darius Adams

customer_reviews.title: Rips knuckles. Rough fabric inside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glove to use for heavy punching bag. I should've listen to other reviewer who mentioned that this is not for a heavy punching bag. The fabric inside is too rough. Got ripped knuckles now
customer_reviews.author: S. L.

customer_reviews.title: Everlast MMS Kick Boxing Gloves
customer_reviews.text: We started kick boxing classes and my husband just loves these new gloves. He likes that his whole hand is not confined. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: looks like it may hold up a
customer_reviews.text: ok product... looks like it may hold up a while
customer_reviews.author: Vietnam vet navy corpsman

customer_reviews.title: These are durable gloves. They are able to take ...
customer_reviews.text: These are durable gloves. They are able to take the impact of a hard punch and still protect your knuckles. The only drawback was it didn't completely cover the knuckle on my right pointer finger, and hence my skin cracked.
customer_reviews.author: clayton sterner

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Size was perfect and they are holding up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ant!n0r3

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: The fit wasn't too flexible and I didn't like the fact that I couldn't wash it so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Yazz

customer_reviews.title: They work great for kickboxing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband. They work great for kickboxing, but they do tend to run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Gelhaus

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fits
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fits. I'm shocked that it only comes in one size and fits with on my large hands. I didn't face any problems with rubbing my knuckles raw.
customer_reviews.author: Jason George

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made and velcro comes off within 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Gloves rough and do not protect
customer_reviews.text: The gloves felt rough on the inside. They do not have enough cushion for kickboxing class. One hand had skin peeling from knuckles on first day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Castro

customer_reviews.title: More like Chuck Butt-Smell after I get done training in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Chuck Liddell? More like Chuck Butt-Smell after I get done training in my Everlast MMA kick boxing hand gloves. They're a little tight around the hand, but then again I am 1/8 bear on my Mother's side. They have great wrist support and don't cut of circulation, which comes in handy when I'm teaching the punching bag a lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Dodie50

customer_reviews.title: Not made for Heavy Bag Use!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not my favorite. I have a hard time getting the wrap and gloves to fit and the gloves alone are so uncomfortable and thin. Too bad I bought a pair for the whole family. These will probably be donated to the gym for those that forget their gloves or the newbies to class.
customer_reviews.author: Milissa Martini

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect
customer_reviews.text: The stitch on one of the fingers arrives ripped. Is this what I am paying for? I did not return it because I really don't have any more time to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Sadal

customer_reviews.title: Not for large hands.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'5" with large hands There was no size, even on the everlast.com website, so I figured they would stretch to fit all sizes, I was wrong. Returned them the next day.
customer_reviews.author: The Customer

customer_reviews.title: It stinks!!
customer_reviews.text: if you have small hands don't order it's a little big plus it stinks horribly. I didn't meet the returning deadline so I'm stuck with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: product looks messy and unusable, It was unconfortable to wear and unable to use it for purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Delly

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the better gloves I've used. Takes a few uses to break-in. After that, they are really confortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: christopher p. butcher

customer_reviews.title: I had no knowledge that I could qualify the vendors ...
customer_reviews.text: I had no knowledge that I could qualify the vendors and the product, unfortunately I put a star the product arrived defective I could only use 3 opportunities I did not return it because the shipment from Venezuela to the United States is very high.
customer_reviews.author: jose vivas

customer_reviews.title: First time wearing them and I will return them
customer_reviews.text: After having cheap gloves for a kickboxing class I'm taking regularly, I decided to buy these gloves because they seemed more professional and I thought they would be more comfortable. Today was the first time I used these gloves and the skin from my knucles came off. They are rough and unconfortable. I would advise anyone to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: sir Diego

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and protection for my fingers and hands, couldn't be more happy. These are great for participating in Belegarth, Dagorhir, and other battle games.
customer_reviews.author: Shanetera

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem when these first came in. The finger holes for one of the gloves would fit fine, but the second one had finger holes to small for me to get my hand all the way in. I did receive replacements, though, and they seem to be working out for me pretty well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my fiancé and he loved them!!! good quality for the price! highly recommended for beginners and even trainers!!
customer_reviews.author: anita hotz

customer_reviews.title: ... at kickboxing class three times a week and they're fantastic. Just a little stiff the first time
customer_reviews.text: I use these at kickboxing class three times a week and they're fantastic. Just a little stiff the first time, but broke in easily.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not good for bag, can feel every punch very stiff
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, I used them for Body Combat classes and they've lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: mandi m mckay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are extremely well made, with high-quality leather on the top and mesh on the palm side. They fit just right and are neither too loose or too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good gloves. At the beginning it hurts your hands but after a few rounds they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Yillian

customer_reviews.title: No more sore knuckled
customer_reviews.text: My son got these for Christmas to use with his speed bag. He was getting cuts on his knuckles before, now with the gloves, he is not. They are made with good quality.
customer_reviews.author: KidShufflingMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great protection, I have long fingers and they cover everything! Which is extra wonderful for a beginner like me who doesn't have their form down pat. They are well padded, a nice weight and the mesh allows your palms to breath. Highly recommended form a gal who has tried out several brands of gloves--Everlast is the King!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Sawyer

product_meta.title: Everlast MMA Kick Boxing Gloves
product_meta.description:
Multi- functional Fight Sports and Fitness training glove

Warranty:

Everlast warrants its products to be free from defects in materials and workmanship for a period of 120 days from date of purchase, provided they have not been subjected to obvious abuse, neglect or misuse. Everlast's sole liability is limited to repairing or replacing products that are returned within this 120-day period, unless specific product literature specifies otherwise.

Please contact customer service for full details, and for replacement assistance at 1-800-821-7930.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
